evidence.claim: Walker Home Health & Hospice mentions adherence to HIPAA standards on their website.
The company references FHIR standards in their care coordination documentation.
They include EDI transactions in their interoperability offerings.
The website discusses integration with Electronic Health Records (EHR) systems, which often utilize HL7.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or API usage for healthcare data exchange found.
